Actions.ActionName: DND__ImportQuickMacroUUID wasn't found in the Quick Macros file

Actions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
Actions.Prompt:
The Quick Macro specified in 'DND__ImportQuickMacroUUID' wasn't found in the Quick Macros file. You'll need to select another one.

Please run the "Import Quick Macro Picker" to find the correct Quick Macro.

Actions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
Actions.Prompt: Multiple Quick Macros are present. Please run the "Import Quick Macro Picker" to find the correct Quick Macro.

Actions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
Actions.Prompt:
An enexpected error occurred.
Error Code: %Variable%Local_ErrorCode%
Error Message: %Variable%Local_ErrorMessage%

Actions.ActionName: If we're called from the Picker, give the user a little instruction

ThenActions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
ThenActions.Prompt:
Hopefully a Quick Macro was just imported. Check it out to see if it's the right one.

If it isn't, you can use "Undo", then run the "Import Quick Macro Picker" again and try another one.
